metadata.description: Provides extra authorization and multi-tenant features to a ASP.NET Core application.
metadata.releaseNotes: - BREAKING CHANGE(medium): If you are using sharding with your multi-tenant app, then read the UpdateToVersion5.md file. - New feature: You can now use a custom database provider with the AuthP library - see documentation for more details. - New feature: It easier to setup sharding / hybrid multi-tenant application via extension method called SetupMultiTenantSharding - New feature: Ability to replace parts of the sharding services, e.g. store sharding data in a database instead of a json file.
